result.description:
This view is only intended to be used by the report home page.
It uses several left joins to get all the information that is needed. In detail:
- sys_documentation --> to get the table display name (column table)
- report_stats --> to get all audit info (like num executions etc..)
- sys_metadata --> to get the sys_created_by column of a report

result.name: report_home_details
